item.title: Sylvia Vrethammar — a Swedish singer with a unique voice and a wide vocal range, released a song of support to Ukraine in difficult time, and shared her emotions and experiences caused by the war in our country. The song "Broken Soul" is playing on Ukrainian Radio.
item.description: Sylvia Vrethammar — a Swedish singer with a unique voice and a wide vocal range, released a song of support to Ukraine in difficult time, and shared her emotions and experiences caused by the war in our country. The song "Broken Soul" is playing on Ukrainian Radio.
